restaurants.name: Boggabri Hotel Bistro
restaurants.notes: Classic country pub bistro with steaks, schnitzels, and seasonal specials. Often hosts local farming groups and has a quieter back dining room suitable for meetings.

restaurants.name: The Namoi River Hotel & Grill
restaurants.notes: Focus on local beef and lamb, with a paddock-to-plate bent. Good off-street parking for utes and trailers and a semi-private corner area that can seat small groups.

restaurants.name: Railway Hotel & Kitchen Gunnedah
restaurants.notes: Popular with local growers; offers hearty meals, some share plates, and a quieter dining section away from the main bar.

restaurants.name: The Crossing Bistro
restaurants.notes: Contemporary country pub dining with a focus on regional produce and seasonal menus. Offers bookings for farm discussion groups and has a small function room subject to availability.
